import React from 'react' const NewsItems = (props) => { let { title, description, imageUrl, newsUrl, date, author, source } = props; return (
{source}

By {!author ? "Unkonown" : author} on {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

{title}

{description}...

Read more
) } export default NewsItems
